description: Becca's Sloth Facts is the must have skill for all sloth lovers.  Think sloths are slow boring animals?  After you hear Becca's sloth facts you will be amazed at what fascinating creatures sloths are.
exampleInteractions: Alexa tell sloth facts to give me a fact
Alexa ask sloth facts for a fact
name: Becca's Sloth Facts
shortDescription: Love sloths? Listen to all the sloth facts your heart can handle.
